extendedInfo.description: #1 Data Monitor AppIntroducing BestSignal's stand-alone data tracking app.  BestSignal's Data Monitor App offers users a first-of-its-kind UI -- one that reports WiFi and cellular data usage by application, day, week, and billing cycle ALL on ONE beautiful, intuitively-designed PAGE.  Android data tracking has never been easier -- simply select the settings button, input several pieces of information, and allow BestSignal's Data Monitor App to do the rest.  All you'll need is a phone and a finger.  Download it for free right now and avoid future data overages.Features Include:â Easily swipe through your cellular and WiFi data usage.âScroll through a descending list of data hogs â functions and applications. Users may personalize by telling our Data Monitor App when and how theyâd like to be notified.â Beautiful, modern, and first-of-its-kind user interface.  This alone makes it worthwhile.â and much, much more!No other data tracking app combines more information and ease-of-use!  Download it now and improve your Android data tracking.
